Succulents.name: Sedum reflexum 'Blue Spruce'
Succulents.water: Regular water in spring to summer
Succulents.about: 'Blue Spruce' is a hardy, low-maintenance ground cover succulent with blue-green leaves that turn salmon pink in winter.
Succulents.about2: Growth Habit: Low Growing / Creeping, Hanging / Trailing
Succulents.about3: Seasonality: Blooms in Summer, Year-round Color
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Super hardy, attracts pollinators

Succulents.name: Sedum hybridum 'Immergrünchen'
Succulents.about: 'Immergrünchen' is a robust ground cover with red and green foliage, producing yellow flowers in mid- to late summer.
Succulents.about2: Growth Habit: Low Growing / Creeping, Hanging / Trailing

Succulents.name: Sedum dasyphyllum 'Himalayan Skies'
Succulents.about: 'Himalayan Skies' features blue foliage on creeping stems, producing small white blooms in early summer.
Succulents.about2: Growth Habit: Low Growing / Creeping, Hanging / Trailing
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Easy to propagate, pet safe

Succulents.name: Sedum album 'Coral Carpet'
Succulents.about: 'Coral Carpet' is a low-growing ground cover with bead-like leaves that can turn from green to red. It produces small white star-shaped flowers.
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Hard to kill, fast grower, easy to propagate, pet safe

Succulents.name: Sedum spurium 'Dragon's Blood'
Succulents.about: 'Dragon's Blood' is a colorful ground cover that transitions from bright green to wine red. It produces red flowers and stems.
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Easy to propagate, pet safe

Succulents.name: Sedum reflexum 'Angelina'
Succulents.about: 'Black Pearl' is a low-growing ground cover with small, beady leaves of bright green and dark purple tones. It can tolerate full sun, rocky soil, droughts, and frosts.
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Hard to kill, fast grower, easy to propagate, pet safe

Succulents.name: Sedum reflexum 'Blue Spruce'
Succulents.water: Regular water in spring to summer
Succulents.about: 'Blue Spruce' is a hardy, low-maintenance ground cover succulent with blue-green leaves that turn salmon pink in winter.
Succulents.about2: Growth Habit: Low Growing / Creeping, Hanging / Trailing
Succulents.about3: Seasonality: Blooms in Summer, Year-round Color
Succulents.about4: Special Characteristic: Super hardy, attracts pollinators

Succulents.name: Sedum sediforme 'Turquoise Tails'
Succulents.about: 'Turquoise Tails' is a ground cover succulent with turquoise-blue leaves and yellow flowers in summer.

Succulents.name: Sedum spurium 'Voodoo'
Succulents.about: 'Voodoo' is a ground cover succulent with reddish-bronze leaves and pink flowers in late summer.

Succulents.name: Sedum lineare f. variegatum - Carpet Sedum
Succulents.about: 'Carpet Sedum' is a low-growing succulent with variegated leaves and yellow flowers in summer.
